column5: The gas here dropped 11 cents over night. My gawd,pull out the party fav and lets get jiggy with it. L M A O  Oh,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,, just a bit to much caffine this morn,n.
I guess I should fill up if they drop in the Bradford area too
.97 cents I noticed on the way in this morning... hmmm I wonder what they will attribute this to and how long will it last? HH
We should build a tanker and start hoarding!
so, $0.97 is a good deal?   Let's get excited when it gets down below $0.80.  I filled up on the way in this morning, too.  Every cent equals a dollar for me, so I capitalize whenever I can.
I've been paying 86.9 to 87.3 for the last couple of months now...oh ya...that's diesel...sorry  They say the price drop is a higher amount of stores and the higher Canadian dollar ?  Maureen
Let's see... .97x3.8=$368.6 per U.S gallon, and we're still at $2.89 down here in Redneckville... still kinda pricey if ya ax me
wow our gas must be made of gold to warrant $368.6 Per US Gallon.... I say we sell all we have to the US and live free forever! LOL   Gerritt.
